ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): handleContrato = widget.Entity.ObjetoInstance.ContratoHandle
podeVisualizar = widget.Entity.ObjetoInstance.ContratoEmElaboracao(handleContrato) if widget.View.Commands["Edit"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = podeVisualizar if widget.View.Commands["Delete"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = podeVisualizar if widget.View.Commands["New"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = podeVisualizar
